website_summaries.verdict: At 25 feet, this 3.5-millimeter cable offers quality sound for a household that needs to connect 2 devices across a room, and it's tough enough to stand up to commercial use.
pros: While FosPower makes cables in smaller sizes, it's the versatility of their professional grade 25-foot cable that earns it a spot on the list
This is long enough to stretch across the average household room, while the length also makes this cord useful for commercial audio setups as well
Tin-plated copper core and thick insulated coating are tough enough to stand up to a job environment as well
cons: This long cord will tangle if given too much slack during use, and is impractical for use in cars or for handheld devices

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality but the gold tip snapped in half
customer_reviews.text: Today on 4/29/17, as I was removing the cable from my computer's audio jack, the gold tip snapped in half. I have spent the last hour using tweezers to try and remove this darn thing from my computer's audio jack. I rarely ever remove this from my computer as this hooks my computer up to the speakers so maybe it's a quality issue and not an over usage issue. The sound quality is good but the build quality failed today. I have owned this since November 2015 5/16/17 Excellent customer service and warranty. Would recommend this product and company
customer_reviews.author: a dissatisfied dell customer

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of all background static! Best Shielding.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. It got rid of all the RF interference static that I had with my other cord. The combination of mylar foil and braided copper shielding is the best. I have nothing but beautiful silence (no static background) and these are the 25 foot cables. I had moved my computer and needed three of these to connect it to my 5.1 surround speaker system. I looked through ever M-M cable on Amazon and found this and the KabelDirekt to be the best but it appears that Amazon is currently selling a cheap knockoff version, so this FosPower cable was the only and best choice.
customer_reviews.author: The Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Great Audio Cable.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this 15 foot audio cable. Most of the time I use it to connect my Amazon Echo Dot to an external speaker on the other end of the room. I have also used it to connect my IPhone 6 to my home audio system. It is long enough to allow me to move around the room and produces excellent sound quality. This cable appears to be made of high quality materials. It is nice and flexible, easy to move around without getting tangled or kinked. I would buy this cable again in a minute.
customer_reviews.author: C. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound transmission
customer_reviews.text: I changed the old audio cable of my headphone because a intermittent bad connection. But surprise with this new cable. There is a big difference regarding the sound quality with the new cable. I am a fan of baroque music and listening now to the same recordings, with the new cable I can hear instruments and fine details that I couldn't before! I highly recommend to change your original cable even if this one is still in good condition!
customer_reviews.author: John A. Testelin

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed - certainly did not expect the type of quality in this type of product!
customer_reviews.text: My wife keep complaining about the excess cable running all over our center console, so i bit the bullet and jumped on amazon to find a shorter audio cable to connect my iPhone - bought this because of the length and cost, did not consider quality - but when I received the item, from the packing, to the warranty card to the product i was blown away with the high quality look and feel, the fit, finish and performance are superb - what a great find and a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great double male 3.5mm cable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to connect my bluetooth adapter to my stereo in my garage. PROs: 1) Excellent sound quality. I used to suffer from static that was due to cheap cables. I don't have any static with this cable 2) Seems very well built. The ends are firmly attached. 3) Ends fit directly into my phone with the case on (something many of these do NOT do). CONs: None So far.
customer_reviews.author: Allison & Bill Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Great cable
customer_reviews.text: I have a lengthy cord that I use to go from my laptop, phone, tablet, etc. under the carpet to my speakers on the other side of my living room. It's a simple setup, but it works great. Older cables I have used frequently have loose connections and make static-type noises when I move the device I'm using. This cable was more expensive than others I've used in the past, but the connection is perfectly snug on every device and the sound is perfect. I can't attest to the durability of the product as I've only had it a week or so, but the cables seem thick, the connections strong, and I think it will last me quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Really like this cable, it is sturdy and well made. The previous cabke I was using started breaking where the cable meets the plug. With the sturdiness od the coating and the metal end I don't see that happening with this cable I use it for audio from my phone to the stock stereo in my 2008 Nissan Altima. It works perfectly for that purpose. My phone is attched to a magnetic vent clip and the 1' length is perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Terminals don’t make contact
customer_reviews.text: On my first use connecting my Sony entertainment center amp to my wh-900n headphones the connectors did not make good contact. With great pressure the would touch one side or the othe but not both, and as soon as I released my hold on the contact there was no sound at all. To make sure it wasn’t a hard ware problem, I used another cord in the same configuration and it worked perfectly. I also tried the cord with my IPad Air 2, IPhone 6, and new IPhone XR and had the same issues. I purchased the 15’ cord, and after all of my playing around have come to the conclusion that the terminals may not be machined properly.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I tried a couple of Bluetooth adapters to hook up my sound bar with my projector. The sound was off or they just didn’t work. Bought this cord to simplify things. Works great. Produces good sound and now the words actually line up with the picture on the screen
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Seller
customer_reviews.text: Bought these just a short time ago, in November 2019. One end already went south on me. They're used only to connect my headphones to my tv. So they didnt have to endure much movement. UPDATED REVIEW The company saw my issue via this review and reached out to me. They are sending out a replacement cable. No charge and keep the original. Doesn't get any better than that. You can buy with confidence from FosPower.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: For all audiophiles if you listen in a car
customer_reviews.text: and don't want to mess with long cables to listen to music or remove cases because your cord doesn't have case extension. This cable is it. If you phone attached near your media player this cable takes out a lot of worries, since 1' foot is almost like half meter and thats plenty inside the car in between media player and phone connected near it.
customer_reviews.author: bkguy

customer_reviews.title: High quality long stereo audio cable for outdoor movies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this audio cable to allow the hookup of a set of PC speakers to an outdoor video projector. With COVID taking over the summer, we've resorted to showing movies outside as a way to keep things interesting. The projector is in the rear, and the speakers needed to be in the front by the screen. Enter this 25ft cable. It has help up so far to almost 4 months of repeated setups and tear downs without a single crackle or any static in the line or connectors. Overall quality of the cable and jacket are very nice, and the molded feel of the connectors is also well done. Very satisfied for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Magic Mike

customer_reviews.title: Second One I Bought (first one still going strong, ordered a second because I needed a second)
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that I bought. The first one impressed me, that one still works, I needed another aux cord for another product and immediately went through my purchases and ordered this a second time. It is strurdy, well built, and solid materials used. I will buy a third one if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping for more integrity with the cable
customer_reviews.text: Granted it comes with gold plated metal for the jacks, but I found it far too easily subjected to dropouts or one channel if the cable is bent by the jack at either end, even with sufficient length. They should have promoted a stress sleeve on the cable with respect to bending. For this issue, I cannot recommend this as a high quality cable for the price. I am tempted to ship them back in exchange for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gidagorfen

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have just received my AUX and I have to say I was happily surprised. Right away the quality was evident and the sleekness was great and what I was looking for. The connection is nice and snug and it was exactly what I was looking for. I had frequented two retail stores and initially wasted valuable time only to find complete inferior limited products. I highly suggest this item, I am very happy with it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Dina M.

customer_reviews.title: Please accept my apology
customer_reviews.text: I made a HUGE error in writing a review of another product on this product's review page. The review was for a projector screen. So for the truth of the matter. There was no issues at all with the product. I simply didn't need it because of I had a wireless feature available that I wasn't aware of initially. So please please accept my apology. Cord was sturdy and just as advertised. Packaged well also. T
customer_reviews.author: T. McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, perfect length and easily installed!
customer_reviews.text: I used to connect TV to Bose wave for movie watching. Sound is great! Quality of cable appears to be good and length is perfect. Arrived as promised. I would recommend and if needed purchase from this seller again
customer_reviews.author: Lynda C

customer_reviews.title: Was Good While It Lasted!
customer_reviews.text: This 3.5mm 1 ft male to male audio cable worked great for just under 3 months. Now I get static when the cable is moved at all or if is still in the wrong position, there is a constant buzz sound, meaning a bad connection. Cable is not moved a lot or abused in any way. I'm sure it's not the receiving female input because when I replace the cable with another one, the buzz goes away. I will contact manufacturer to see how they stand behind their limited Life Time Warranty. The 3 starts on the quality is because nothing appears to be broken but the fact I have an issue must say something about the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Biff

customer_reviews.title: Don't fall in me....
customer_reviews.text: The cord is well made and the sound quality is excellent. I selected the chord because it was the second- best rated chord on the market. The number one cord did not meet my requirements for my Sony headphones. Unfortunately, this cord does not work either as it continuously falls out of the headphone port. When I hold out in the sound quality is excellent-- just don't want to go around holding a cord into my headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Carl West

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Got this 5 months ago for my car. Stopped working today. Would say that a good run for the price because it took a lot of abuse (I connect/disconnect my phone every time I drive). EXCEPT then I remembered that a pandemic hit and I didn’t drive hardly at all after getting this item in March 2020. Would probably have been fine if I plugged it in and left it alone. Would not recommend if you’re going to plug into something frequently.
customer_reviews.author: K H

customer_reviews.title: JUST RIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for the car...the last cable I had was 6 foot long and in the car it just kept getting in the way...this shorter cord is perfect...just reaches from the stereo jack on the radio to the phone I have in its dash stand...would highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, flexible cable
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be the cable to beat. I've tried various other brands, and this one stands out. Sound quality is good, it's extremely flexible and lays flat, and so far the build quality seems to be great. Time will tell but the overall quality of the cable is very good. Using it as a headphone cable is a great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Largent

customer_reviews.title: Nice cable!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a long analog audio cable and experience told me that buying the cheapest is a terrible idea. Even cheap short cables can sound terrible. Mind you I don't want to pay Monster Cable prices either. This one isn't very expensive, yet seems (and sounds) like it's pretty high quality. The jack fits perfectly in my devices. There's no static, no bad connection.
customer_reviews.author: Darkraiven!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used this to run from HDMI audio breakout box to an audio amplifier for a mother in law who has severe hearing degradation. Even though this is a long cable my setup worked exactly as hoped and my wife is so happy that her Mom can now enjoy watching tv once again. A real quality of life improvement thanks to this little product.
customer_reviews.author: Beacon

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Solid sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Knocking one star for build quality. The one end is loose from the wire. Which I have read (this issue) happening with others. Obviously a general build issue they haven't been too concerned about fixing. Works fine though. I'll leave that end plugged into the car's end so it's not being messed with often.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned reading all the reviews on these and other cords of this type... But these came well packaged and are in great condition... Honestly probably the best quality I have ever owned... No bends, no cracks or crackle & nice thickness cord. I am very happy with them and they are functioning great right now as I am listening to music thru this very item.
customer_reviews.author: Oxy

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: This cable worked great for as long as it worked, which wasnt very long. I only used this in my car as I don't have Bluetooth audio and it didn't go through that much but eventually the connection just wasn't working and the audio would only come out of one side of the car speakers and then neither.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S

customer_reviews.title: Get Some Spares
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a spare and ended up using it as my Number One. Haven't had it long enough to tell you why, exactly, but it just feels like a quality cable...just the right heft and smoothly flexible without kinking. At this price, get a few more than you think you need. I have never regretted carrying a few extra cables, they don't weigh much or take up a lot of room, and they've saved my little butt more than once.
customer_reviews.author: Peone

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Length
customer_reviews.text: Well it’s not actually 25 ft so if you need 25 ft, this will not work for you. I bought two cords for my computer, both 25 feet. One is long enough, one is not and it’s this one! It’s somewhere between 24 and 25 ft but not close enough to 25 because I needed just under that.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Harring

customer_reviews.title: iPhone connection to my stereo system - awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Toyota 4Runner and wanted to enable my iPhone to work through the speaker system. I did some Googling and found the suggestion for this cable and the location of the output (odd location as it's within the compartment between the front seats). Hooked it up, turned the stereo to auxiliary and it worked like a charm. (The volume is controlled more by the iphone vs the stereo -fyi.) Love that I can listen to my music, podcasts or audio books during my commute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: They do not cause any interference and I was easily able to route the cable to my sound system to keep our kids sane while on a trip. I'm glad they have varying lengths in size. Wish I would have taken pictures of it while in use, but I find it silly to do after the fact. This was for a sound cable connection from my iPad 3 to my Jeep Wrangler (2013) sound system.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal for the money!
customer_reviews.text: A lot better than others I have tried. So far seems to good quality product with no static or apparent loss of signal, nice construction and appearance. sleek pro-quality re-usable packaging as well. My use is to provide high quality audio to hi-def speakers (10 feet distance away) from multiple software packages on my laptop. Works as intended. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Zen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cable to allow transfer of music from an Echo Dot to a Bose Wave radio. The performance is great: the cable runs through a spider web of power and data carrying cables, and the quality of signal to the Bose is noise-free.
customer_reviews.author: Ric C

customer_reviews.title: SEEM TO BE GOOD QUALITY  ..
customer_reviews.text: These cables came in within two days from date of order .. Seem to be of great quality .. tested both to make sure they worked .. ALL is well .. VERRY happy with this purchase .. would surely buy again .. Russ Pratt, Webster, MA
customer_reviews.author: MiniBoy

customer_reviews.title: I had high hopes for it because the appearance looks to be good quality, but it only works if plugged into ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a week ago to replace my aux cord that had broke, I had high hopes for it because the appearance looks to be good quality, but it only works if plugged into my phone just right and the slightest movement causes the audio to stop playing. I know it's not my audio jack because I've tested my device with other aux cords.
customer_reviews.author: Michaella

customer_reviews.title: Great, quality, excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This cable went beyond my expectations and completely solved my issue with my MP3 player. They are the best cable I've seen = quality is easily determined by the great end connectors, thick wire, and yes, the packaging is professional and shows how excellent this company and product is. I would absolutely recommend this cable and anything else from this company.
customer_reviews.author: poolskater

customer_reviews.title: Well since you asked...
customer_reviews.text: One end is slighter smaller than the other. The thinner end easily falls out on any devices I use it on. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: My bad
customer_reviews.text: Loud hum and cutting out that was due to a bad adapror, I used one that I knew was good and now I've had no problems. I left a bad review first but now from one star to five. Good cable and great length (25 ft)
customer_reviews.author: D. Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: POS. I needed a 15 footer so I tried using this with brand new headphones but there was no sound out of the right and a mere whisper out of the left. When I use the 3ft cord that came with the headphones everything is loud and clear so it’s definitely this terrible Fospower cable.
customer_reviews.author: Salena Roper

customer_reviews.title: the 15' cable works great.. but i use it for my ipod ...
customer_reviews.text: the 15' cable works great..but i use it for my ipod on my treadmill and 15 feet is a bit too much..so i turned around and ordered the one foot..but both are great products!!..length is the only deciding factor
customer_reviews.author: jan j.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a short cord for my MP3 player to plug into a portable speaker. I worried the sound might not come through loud enough buying from an online site. This is great! The sound is strong, as is the cable. The jacks are also made of strong material. It isn't thin, loose, or flimsy. So happy I went with this brand and will recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: CynthiaLee

customer_reviews.title: Ideal product and very high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great product that is essential when you can’t always trust Bluetooth to work. I keep this in my projector bag and use it for movie nights. Great length and very high quality. Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Great company to deal with!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE--Company contacted me and sent out another cable which works perfectly! Great customer service and will definitely purchase any other audio cables I need from them. Great company who stands behind their product and goes above and beyond to make the customer happy! Thank you Fos!! Not happy with this cable. Opened it up, plugged it in, and has an obvious short. Cracks and pops and loses audio. Luck of the draw I guess. Buy elsewhere if I were you...
customer_reviews.author: Tony B

customer_reviews.title: Nice Audio Extension Cable
customer_reviews.text: I needed to extend my TV audio output across the room to some Bose computer speakers. I used the TV's 3.5mm headphone jack to avoid bluetooth or wifi audio lag. This cable provided nice shielding and the audio is clear and there is no perceivable signal noise. The cable and connectors seem to be good quality and provide a good connection and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy P Zgonena

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice, but poor assembled and even poorer performance
customer_reviews.text: The cord came and it worked perfectly the first time I used it. Minimal noise when recording. However, I then noticed there were cuts and scratches in the shielding. Next time I used it, it completely failed. It would only pick up noise and none of the audio was communicated. I found out you can unscrew the shielding near the jacks and underneath, the electrical points looked whimsically connected. Would not recommend this product because, even though it feels study and high quality, assembly is obviously careless and it very much impacts the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Jono

customer_reviews.title: Great item for a peaceable house (for headphones)
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Decided to get the longer cord ($1 more from 10' to 15'). So glad I did! Got these for the TV headphones which came w/a short cord, probably for a computer. At any rate, they work great and our house is so peaceful b/c of them. A must have if TV watchers are at odds about when to watch.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hill

customer_reviews.title: Does what is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Used the cable to connect my laptop to my stereo to play Pandora. Works fine, I think my laptop input is shaky, not the cable, have to wiggle it or I get static. Just a suggestion - if you think you need 15', buy a 25' cable :)
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: This 3.5mm audio cable is just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine I'll ever need a cord like this again since it's for a specific case of running outdoor cordless speakers for an outdoor movie projector. That said it's exactly what I wanted and the quality of the sound and the material of the cable is great.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.H.E

customer_reviews.title: Already shorting out
customer_reviews.text: I use this for playing an app on a portable speaker at night. I don't really move my set up so there is very little jostling of the connector. I received it on 10/16/19. It's already being glitchy and has to be wiggled to just the right position for the sound to work.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got it hooked up without any issue. Sounds is good even with length of cable. Only used for a week so can't speak to durability yet but the cable feels sturdy and ends are securely attached.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bock

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality sound solution
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered a computer subwoofer system to put on my living room TV. Budget sound system right. I bought this 25ft fospower aux cord so that I could move the entire system behind my couch along the wall. Perfect. Material looks and feels solid and heavy duty. Im a construction and landscaping contractor so I know a good quality when I see it. All of my coworkers and friends are buying these now to use at BBQs party's and much more down here in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Wartide850

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this has so many awesome reviews. I wonder if people review it right after they get it and don’t come back to update it? I would have rated this 5 stars right after I got it, but after only two months it stopped working. The sound would only come through one side of the car stereo. To get the sound on both sides I had to kink the cord and hold it in place. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Best AUX cable you can get... QUALITY MATTERS
customer_reviews.text: No more noise coming from the speakers (common issue with non shielded AUX cords). Absolutely no loss in signal and minimal noise. Outstanding build quality, AUX cables tend to break overtime due to constant use. I'm tired of using cheap cables with terrible sound quality and replacing them so often. Definitely will buy again from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: After 2 months, lost left channel
customer_reviews.text: After two months of regular (but immobile, gentle) use, one end of the cable will not carry the left audio channel anymore. You can rotate it in whatever 3.5 jack it's in and hear the channel crackling, but no more audio. I have to question this cable's build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Davis

customer_reviews.title: well made and works well
customer_reviews.text: *Chrustine's husband here* well made, I should have gotten a longer one. It works well and have yet to have an issue with length, though I may at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these to connect my Echo dot to a pill speaker
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to connect two of my bluetooth speakers to Echo Dots in my kitchen and living room. Because of bluetooth syncing issues it was easier to physically connect the speaker to the Dot and these short cables worked perfectly. They seem nice and heavy, but as I have only had them for a month I can't comment on the durability over time.
customer_reviews.author: JASkets

customer_reviews.title: Junk!  Find another brand.
customer_reviews.text: Failed in a year. One end is always plugged into my car stereo faceplate. The other gets plugged into an audio device. The cable hardly moves and now it cuts out like crazy. Poor quality cable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality sheilded audio cable
customer_reviews.text: Needed shielded audio extension cable for outdoor tv connection to sound system. Appears to be decent quality for a fixed application, not sure how it would hold up with constant movement and re connection.
customer_reviews.author: tparf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect to connect my computers audio up to my amplifier in the closet which in turn pumps audio out into the overhead speakers. Thin cable which is what I was going for so it doesn't stand out as much. After dealing with repeated audio failures with wireless solutions, I just went back to a wire.
customer_reviews.author: Tylerrrr

customer_reviews.title: Ipod works fine with headphones
customer_reviews.text: arrived in sealed packaging but the speaker crackles and doesn't sound right. Ipod works fine with headphones, but not attached to a speaker with this cable.
customer_reviews.author: CLM

customer_reviews.title: Great, heavy duty, durable design
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty durable design. Just to try it i wrapped this around my basketball hoop (folded it in half then threw one end over the hoop) and lifted myself up (im 150lbs) with it and it works completely fine after with no loss if quality
customer_reviews.author: Anthony DeVor

customer_reviews.title: The length
customer_reviews.text: Was tired of not having much room to move about with with a 3ft. cord. the 10'' inch one I have is much too long, as I have had one too many tangle ups. This is just right the right I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Use it to connect my projector to a large 15” speaker. Also to connect my iPhone to the same speaker. No problem with connection. Sound remains the same quality no changes
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work just fine
customer_reviews.text: I use this to watch movies and action shows at night while my family is asleep, the sound quality out of my headphones is excellent so I'm assuming the cable is doing its job.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: It will work great for a couple months, but then the screwable cap will eventually get loose. Once that happens, audio quality won't be consistent again. Will always have to adjust it to that "sweet spot" and is super annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: but I am pretty sure it's not the cable's fault
customer_reviews.text: Seems high quality! My speakers I am running this through might have an issue though since it comes in and out, but I am pretty sure it's not the cable's fault.
customer_reviews.author: HSquared

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: prompt , intact, undamaged delivery. Good price. Product as advertised. No strain-relief at each jack, and outer jacket is plane PVC, so I am unsure of long-term durability, but it is performing well for 3 days without repositioning the cable.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Quick Service on Delivery
customer_reviews.text: The product came very fast. Unfortunately it didn't work as I would have liked. I was trying to connect external speakers to my Smart TV. The speakers and TV inputs were not compatible and I was unable to use this product. However, I would highly recommend anyone else to use this company.
customer_reviews.author: V. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for connecting iPhone to sound system.
customer_reviews.text: Precisely as described. Worked great for connecting iPhone to conf room surround sound system for presentation when the GoToMtg was unavailable. Great results, fit well without removing Otterbox. Only complaint was that USPS marked as undeliverable at ou 24/7 business (postman didn't bother to go to the dispatcher/ shpg&recvg window). But was delivered the next business day.
customer_reviews.author: a guy

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: Audio sounds fine, haven't noticed any issues there. the covers for the input are threaded and keep twisting of which is very annoying. not sure why they would do that? other than that i haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I tested the cable when I first got it. I bought it for my projector for outdoor screenings. Worked great in my test but have only used it once.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Grotegut

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a long cord for an iPad install in my Truck. The route I wanted to go would not let me get by with a 10 foot cord. I also wanted it took look sharp, matching the dash and not be "pink" or "hot green" type color. This fit the bill very well! I had plenty of cord left over, it looked nice in the truck, and of course it worked too. Great price and very impressed. Thanks for the attention to detail.
customer_reviews.author: rockchalk06

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Using for headphones across to the other side of room. Appears to work well so far, have only used a couple of times. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney G. Dahlgren

customer_reviews.title: Great cable for a great price
customer_reviews.text: So far I think this cable is great. It seems well made and sturdy. The sound is really good. No buzz or crackle. It shipped fast, too.
customer_reviews.author: SheRok

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price for a double shielded cable.
customer_reviews.text: This cable appears to be really well made. For now I'm using this for audio from PC to an external stereo speaker and have no problems with that. The best thing about this cable is it's double shielded and would work well in vehicles or other electrically noisy environments which I may use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Frey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Problem solved! We wanted to use a soundbar with our wall-mounted tv and could not connect with bluetooth. Old-school fix, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: pmata1

customer_reviews.title: One litte cable . . . one huge difference!
customer_reviews.text: It works like a charm!! What a difference it made to the sound in my car. I thought either my sound system had gone bad, or my mp3 player. Nope. It was the cable. I highly recommend this cable. It made me a happy person! I drive 4+ hours every day and depend on my music. Ahhhhh . . . .
customer_reviews.author: Biblios

customer_reviews.title: For phone to car radio that doesn't have Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Plugs into the audio jack in my phone then into the AUX in a car stereo that doesn't have Bluetooth. Also works well to plug into any speaker that has that type of audio port, say at your friends house into their sound bar!! Definitely recommend, would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa1106

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound quality, you get what you pay for. Can't say it really matters in my case, but it arrived broken. I attached a picture of the defect. The (aesthetic) metallic guard simply does not fit onto the threaded port.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Used to connect soundbar to switcher
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to keep my setup in my bedroom low key and not use a bulky stereo, and my soundbar doesn't have an HDMI pass-through, so my options were optical or 3.5mm. I wanted to snake it through the wall, so optical was out since it would likely break trying to fish it through some tight turns. This cable held up perfectly and sounds great. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W.

customer_reviews.title: Cable sound
customer_reviews.text: I really recommend this product, I connect it to my speakers and I like a lot the sound, Perfect, 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Reuther

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in April of 2017. It is December and I think I've used it 5 times. Today it started acting up causing static and losing audio entirely based on position. So frustrating. It felt like it would last too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas KidaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not much to say
customer_reviews.text: This cable does its job. I have the cable running from my projector audio out to my sound bar. Sounds great, no quality concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Durable Extended Connection
customer_reviews.text: Great for a long connection from a computer to an entertainment center. Cable seems durable, quick and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to RV sound system.
customer_reviews.text: Only used a couple of times, so far. Purchased to power remote speaker in Class B camper. Much easier to plug this in than any wiring project I may have attempted. Seems to be very well made, I expect it to be all I wanted it to be. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: JESSE A CROSBY

customer_reviews.title: EXPECT ALOT OF STATIC
customer_reviews.text: Overall they will last you for about 2 days before the statics start to creep in. Quality is there but durability is not. I use this for my car aux and have ordered a new aux. Theres better options on amazon and cheaper as well. Will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: DrV

customer_reviews.title: EMI interference with Echo Dot
customer_reviews.text: EMI interference pretty bad with my Echo Dot. Cable doesn't work well around computer monitors, which is driving me to buy and test a different cable of equal lengths. I'll update the rating if test results or other interference issues as appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: ChuckJ in Az

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hooking up equipment
customer_reviews.text: Used it to connect an MP3 player to headphones. As other users have mentioned, the plastic cap covering the plug ends could be made better. It tends to pull away from the plug when you unplug the cable.
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Bad. Go with a different brand.
customer_reviews.text: Too fragile. Didn't even last two months when normally ear buds last for 4 and audio jacks last me 6-8 months. Would not recommend sadly. Little metal pieces near the jacks came off after 2 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Forgey

customer_reviews.title: short life span
customer_reviews.text: it worked well and I loved it, was the perfect size for my setup, but after a few short weeks of normal decent use, it wouldn't work without bending the cable a certain way, and now after about a month of having it rigged up to work, it is not working properly at all and won't give me audio out of my right headphone. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND. I might try a different brand and hopefully get better results
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Good aux cable
customer_reviews.text: Great auxiliary cord. I use a my desk top and it is long enough to allow me to move around some. Seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B

customer_reviews.title: tie it up!
customer_reviews.text: modest cost great cable...nest time i will get the next longer this is perfect. its a wire thing. thanks B.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Plug it in and it works great! Nice short size. My husband uses it with his hearing aid amplifier to watch movies on an airplane or his tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Dartthecat

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great. Much better than a basic audio cable, certainly. I can't attest to the durability as I have only had it one week
customer_reviews.author: Laura Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Metal Ends, Exactly What You Expect.
customer_reviews.text: Connections were tight and solid metal which is nice. rubber felt nice, didn't really see any issues. would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: matthew rachwal

customer_reviews.title: Drum kit connection.
customer_reviews.text: Product durability and length. Application: cord between TD-9 module (mix in), and CD/Radio (Head Phone input). Part of setup for headphone home drum practicing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low priced sturdy cable
customer_reviews.text: This cable seems to be well built. I have used other cables that come apart where the wire connects to the end piece and this one has remained intact. The wire is a thick guage and the piece between the connector and the wire holds together well. I have it installed in a mini van and it stays there full time. My wife keeps setting her purse on the cable which tuggs on it and it has not come apart yet. Unless you like replacing cheaper cables frequently, I would recommend purchasing this one.
customer_reviews.author: Greg W

customer_reviews.title: One month And it breaks!
customer_reviews.text: It's already shorting out! I bought it in July! And of course the return window has closed. So frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: lexi

customer_reviews.title: Great product. It does the job
customer_reviews.text: First off, Great product. It does the job. BUT the cool looking chrome is just kinda screwed on there. I reccomend taking some glew or locktight and putting a little dab. Thats what I did. Other than that I love the cables.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

product_meta.title: FosPower Audio Cable (25 FT), Stereo Audio 3.5mm Auxiliary Short Cord Male to Male Aux Cable for Car, Apple iPhone, iPod, iPad, Samsung Galaxy, HTC, LG, Google Pixel, Tablet & More
feature_bullets: [MALE TO MALE] Connectors: 1 mini-stereo (3.5mm) male to mini-stereo (3.5mm) male cable (25 feet/7.6 meters).
[PREMIUM BUILT CABLES / BEVELED PLUGS] 24k gold plated connectors resist corrosion and reduce tarnish. Beveled step down design plugs allows cable to be fully seated even with case on.
[BUILT FOR FLEXIBILITY AND QUALITY] The PVC jacket, copper braided shielding and aluminum foil shielding provide cable flexibility and greatly reduce undesired EMI/RFI interference.
[COPPER PLATED CORE / STABLE SIGNALS] Tin plated copper core reduces oxidation and increases wire life. Polyethylene Foam (PF) dielectric insulator greatly minimizes signal loss.
[LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY] This product comes with a limited lifetime warranty. Please refer to FosPower's website for more information.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,465 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
